83348.summary: Some customers in the South Surrey area of City are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83348.title: Sept 25 - South Surrey | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
